name: KDS Text Adventure Game
description:
This is the result of a collaboration with Keele Drama Society. 

Navigate your way through this short yet mysterious game.

A special thanks to everyone involved!

Programmed by:
Jack Tacchi

Voices by:
Helena Gordon
Callum Ilkiw
James Ryley

Music by:
Amadeusz Bartos (https://freesound.org/people/ipodpierwsza/sounds/333436/)
